plot: The People's Liberation Army in 1953 smashes a spy ring of the Nationalists and US that attempts to take control of Haima Island in the Taiwan Straits.
title: Ji zhan qian ye
plot_es: The People's Liberation Army in 1953 smashes a spy ring of the Nationalists and US that attempts to take control of Haima Island in the Taiwan Straits.
plot_en: The People's Liberation Army in 1953 smashes a spy ring of the Nationalists and US that attempts to take control of Haima Island in the Taiwan Straits.
